attributes.action: Charge all those ministers with fraud for claiming what they were not due.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If anyone else were to do this, they would most certainly lose their job and be charged with fraud.

Remember ignorance of the law is no defence. 

The government should be setting an example not only doing the right thing, but charging those that have not.

rejection.details: Advice from the Attorney General's office states that the PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have a discretion whether to investigate the matter or not, and the CPS has a discretion whether to prosecute or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
